fields.description: Whether to auto complete restore of this managed database.
fields.name: AutoCompleteRestore

fields.description: Collation of the metadata catalog.
fields.name: CatalogCollation

fields.description: Collation of the managed database.
fields.name: Collation

fields.description: Managed database create mode. PointInTimeRestore: Create a database by restoring a point in time backup of an existing database. SourceDatabaseName, SourceManagedInstanceName and PointInTime must be specified. RestoreExternalBackup: Create a database by restoring from external backup files. Collation, StorageContainerUri and StorageContainerSasToken must be specified. Recovery: Creates a database by restoring a geo-replicated backup. RecoverableDatabaseId must be specified as the recoverable database resource ID to restore. RestoreLongTermRetentionBackup: Create a database by restoring from a long term retention backup (longTermRetentionBackupResourceId required).
fields.name: CreateMode

fields.description: Creation date of the database.
fields.name: CreationDate

fields.description: The restorable cross-subscription dropped database resource id to restore when creating this database.
fields.name: CrossSubscriptionRestorableDroppedDatabaseId

fields.description: The resource identifier of the cross-subscription source database associated with create operation of this database.
fields.name: CrossSubscriptionSourceDatabaseId

fields.description: Target managed instance id used in cross-subscription restore.
fields.name: CrossSubscriptionTargetManagedInstanceId

fields.description: Geo paired region.
fields.name: DefaultSecondaryLocation

fields.description: Earliest restore point in time for point in time restore.
fields.name: EarliestRestorePoint

fields.description: Instance Failover Group resource identifier that this managed database belongs to.
fields.name: FailoverGroupId

fields.description: Whether or not this database is a ledger database, which means all tables in the database are ledger tables. Note: the value of this property cannot be changed after the database has been created.
fields.name: IsLedgerOn

fields.description: Last backup file name for restore of this managed database.
fields.name: LastBackupName

fields.description: The name of the Long Term Retention backup to be used for restore of this managed database.
fields.name: LongTermRetentionBackupResourceId

fields.description: The resource identifier of the recoverable database associated with create operation of this database.
fields.name: RecoverableDatabaseId

fields.description: The restorable dropped database resource id to restore when creating this database.
fields.name: RestorableDroppedDatabaseId

fields.description: Conditional. If createMode is PointInTimeRestore, this value is required. Specifies the point in time (ISO8601 format) of the source database that will be restored to create the new database.
fields.name: RestorePointInTime

fields.description: The resource identifier of the source database associated with create operation of this database.
fields.name: SourceDatabaseId

fields.description: Status of the database.
fields.name: Status

fields.description: Conditional. If createMode is RestoreExternalBackup, this value is used. Specifies the identity used for storage container authentication. Can be 'SharedAccessSignature' or 'ManagedIdentity'; if not specified 'SharedAccessSignature' is assumed.
fields.name: StorageContainerIdentity

fields.description: Conditional. If createMode is RestoreExternalBackup and storageContainerIdentity is not ManagedIdentity, this value is required. Specifies the storage container sas token.
fields.name: StorageContainerSasToken

fields.description: Conditional. If createMode is RestoreExternalBackup, this value is required. Specifies the uri of the storage container where backups for this restore are stored.
fields.name: StorageContainerUri
